Text: Family Reunion Photos Cc It was nice to talk to you this evening It did sound like you had a cold There is no way to protect from going from air conditioning to the outside heathumidity then back into the air conditioning Just try to get some rest and well think positive for some cooler weather for you Attached pls find the photos I spoke of There were of them and I narrowed them to the family I could name Ill write more later It would be great if you all came out around the holidays Love Dave FamilyReunionzip

Hello Cc Rod and Kathy Hello to all How are you guys doing Great I hope Its been awhile since I last heard from you guys so I thought I would drop a short message to you We are all doing pretty well Lauren has completed her college search and has been accepted at Santa Clara University UC San Diego Univ of San Diego Pepperdine and Univ of Puget Sound I think shell end up at Puget Sound she felt most comfortable there She has to decide by May st Lauren is in a musical at school this next few weeks Its called the Wiz She is singing and dancing she has a few different extra rolls She is having great fun with it I do not remember any of this when we were thinking of college Things have changed just alittle I think Janet is feeling ok still having alittle stomach trouble The only thing the Drs can think that might be causing this is her braces on her teeth I think that is pretty remote Well see soon next month when her braces come off I am doing pretty well myself work has been keeping me busy and Ive spent a few extra hours out in the yard I hope to complete the landscaping and sprinklers some time this year Ha ha How are KC and Cory doing School still going ok for them both Well your three homes are probably keeping kathy pretty busy these days It nice that they are all fairly close to Houston so you can get away to them as often as you would like We went up to Seattle and Tacoma last week to vist Puget Sound I really like the area alot I never new that Seattle was such a shoppers paradise The girls shopped for about two days straight Every store you can think of was in a very small section of town A really fun place to visit I just looked at the time and realized I need to get to work this morning Say hello to all for us and write if you have a chance Be good and happy Love Dave Janet and Lauren DDH Product Design Inc SaratogaSunnyvale Rd Suite Saratoga California phone fax
